transcript_chunks.text: Uh-oh, yeah, we're going in uncharted waters, y'all. Drop it! Hey, ladies and gentlemen, in case you didn't know what the heck it is, yeah? Q5 Kinda Funny shout-out to the chicken wing, proud of Long Island, C already, the pure one here... Gys, the producer Seducer next Scorpio, and of course, what's up everybody, Kinda Funny Live, in the middle of the whole set. No sense to seat, so what you can do when if be sitting down? Simple kick RI the heck with a grounding heat dog. It's a rock show, y'all feel the sound, damn right! So we're up in here living loud, hands up for Greg Miller and his team P, squeeze pass Saturday night. If anybody you mothers, I ain't the baddest alive. It's Kinda Funny like watching Police Academy twice. It's Kinda Funny like me, promise a caterpack, chapter three, Half-Life, Jackknife, the lit yet see the length of my teeth to the big dep C. a caterpillar the chapter three half-life Jack knife the lit yet see the length of my teeth to the big deep C Kinda Funny as K gets fresh without taking a the Nick neck impress with kiss it's just the lit Miss B wh chicks get the business Tim Gettys getting his dick but he's dying in every dis prank the had the conversation with Cole just when he said she think it's trend for Poli kicked in unboxing his F thing no Drake Detroit making up P tie shipwrecks intent to be getting this di in in the S be best friend flying in all of us we making every I win we C out we the like decide no but the guys who decided mind you Kinda Funny so guys let's took a second to understand that Tonedeff my favorite artist of all time and one of my biggest Inspirations in life just made a song about us how freaking cool is that did you notice that in addition to the beat sampling the Uncharted theme the verse was entirely made of classic PlayStation sound effects cuz that's freaking awesome I'm utterly in love

cool is that did you notice that in addition to the beat sampling the Uncharted theme the verse was entirely made of classic PlayStation sound effects cuz that's freaking awesome I'm utterly in love with the song and you can download it free at bit.ly/KFthemes in addition to that Tonedeff went all out and put together the Kinda Funny theme pack volume one collecting all the beats he produced that we use as theme songs for Greg Miller's show, Calling Greg Live, Love and Sex Stuff, conversation with Colin Moriarty, the leader, and more, as well as the original rap versions of all those songs please go support him go listen to all of his amazing music and tweet at Tonedeff letting him know what you think he's done a lot for Kinda Funny and loves you guys just as much as we do so go show him some of that Kinda Funny family love peace
